description: NOAA Coral Reef Watch inspired bleaching trajectory covering the 1980-2024 thermal stress history for V3 rehearsal.

control_parameter_R.description: Sea surface temperature anomaly driving Degree Heating Weeks accumulation.

response_sigma.description: Share of global reef cover experiencing bleaching each year.

threshold_estimates.zeta_R: ζ(R) traces interaction between DHW load and symbiont recovery delay; high ζ slows bleaching reversal.

preprocessing_steps: Generate annual bleaching percentages from 1980-2024 using logistic rise after 2015
Couple DHW field to bleaching response with noise consistent with NOAA watch reports
Emit CSV for downstream TypeScript loaders and analysis notebooks
falsification_notes: Live NOAA feeds must keep ΔAIC ≥ 20 beyond linear and exponential nulls; flag if bleaching share drops below 70% for >3 years.
